s.text: I imagine Clark waking to the sound of skyspatter on the morning of Nov. 16 and thinking: "I can't believe this shit."
In a sense, the climbing of Rainier has become the sacred rite of REI culture.

A humorless sense of moral superiority is de rigueur , fostered by the belief that those of us who go out and stomp the natural world under our Vibram soles are healing Gaea while the rest of the world is tearing her down.
